question_text: Overall, to what extent did this production incorporate new or innovative artistic or technical elements?
Which aspects of the production were most innovative? (e.g., set, lighting, multimedia, choreography, technology.)
Were any sets or costumes intentionally designed for reuse in future productions?
If yes, briefly describe the main reusable elements and how they might be used again.
Did innovations in this production lead to any measurable efficiency or capability gains (e.g., hours saved, cost savings, crew training)?
If yes, briefly summarise the most important efficiency or capability gains.
How is this production classified?
Did this production explicitly address any social or community issues?
If yes, which issues were addressed and how were they expressed in the work?
Were Alberta-based artists involved in this production?
If yes, how many Alberta-based artists were involved, and in what key roles?
In your view, what were the key artistic contributions or innovations that distinguished this production?
Were any significant external artistic collaborators engaged (e.g., guest choreographers, designers, visual artists, companies)?
If yes, list the most significant collaborators and their contributions.
Did this production involve any artistic residency (incoming or outgoing)?
If yes, briefly describe the residency (partner, duration, focus).
Did this production require dedicated auditions or recruitment beyond standard company casting?
If yes, in which month did the main auditions or recruitment activities for this production take place?
If yes, approximately how many dancers were auditioned or considered specifically for this production, and how many were ultimately hired?
Was this production performed at a festival or external special event outside our main season?
If yes, name the festival or event, its location (city, country), and the number of performances of this production.
If yes, briefly note any notable media coverage or donor/stakeholder events linked to this festival or event (type and scale, not a full list).
What was the ticket revenue performance for this production versus budget (variance %)?
What was the seats sold performance for this production versus target (variance %)?
What was the average ticket price realised for this production ($)?
Briefly describe the primary audience development tactics used for this production (e.g., subscription campaigns, price offers, experiential events, digital campaigns).
Which tactic had the greatest impact on sales or engagement for this production, and what evidence supports this?
Were any collaborations or sponsorships with luxury brands associated with this production?
If yes, briefly describe the most significant luxury brand involvement (brand, type, and purpose).

How did digital performance for this production compare to a relevant prior period? Please provide % change for website traffic to production/campaign pages and ticketing platform event pages, if available.
